card.name: Ragnarok, the Clock
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, skip the rest of the turn.

card.name: Dual Wield Training
card.text: ■ Choose one of your creatures in the battle zone. When that creature is tapped for the first time this turn, untap it.

card.name: Ifrit Hand
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 9 or less.

card.name: Synchro Spiral
card.text: ■ Instead of paying the cost, you may tap 2 of your water creatures to cast this spell. ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cobanza, Walking Bribe
card.text: ■ Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.

card.name: For You
card.text: ■ For each of your creatures in the battle zone, this creature gets +1000 power. ■ Powered Breaker ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Paralira Sailing
card.text: ■ Gacharange summon. Gacharange Summon ■ Draw a card.

card.name: Way Wave
card.text: ■ When you summon this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a spell that costs 4 or less from your graveyard for no cost. ■ Whenever you cast a spell for the first time each turn, gacharange summon. Gacharange Summon

card.name: Jager a.k.a. Jet
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack or block until the start of your next turn. ■ Gacharange summon. Gacharange Summon

card.name: Shake Shark
card.text: ■ Mana Drive 2 (Water): When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 or more card in your mana zone and one or more of them is water civilization, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Spiral a.k.a. Tornado
card.text: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 7000 or less and return it to the owner's hand. ■ Gacharange summon. Gacharange Summon

card.name: Jenne Topy/GYORAI-CANNON!
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack unless you cast a spell during your turn. ========================= ■ Gacharange summon. That creature gets "speed attacker" until the End Step

card.name: Dangou, Hidden Ruins
card.text: ■ If there are 3 or more spells in your graveyard, this creature gets +4000 power and has "double breaker". ''(A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)''
